verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>. <S%H1984>Praise<s%> ye <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%> from the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> him in the <S%H4791>heights<s%>.
Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye <S%H4397>him<s%>, all his angels: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> ye <S%H6635>him<s%>, all his host.
Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye <S%H8121>him<s%>, sun and <S%H3394>moon<s%>: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> <S%H3556>him<s%>, all ye stars of <S%H216>light<s%>.
Praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8064>him<s%>, ye heavens of <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, And ye <S%H4325>waters<s%> that are above the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>.
Let them <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; For he <S%H6680>commanded<s%>, and they were <S%H1254>created<s%>.
He hath also <S%H5975>established<s%> them for <S%H5703>ever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever<s%>: He hath <S%H5414>made<s%> a <S%H2706>decree<s%> which shall not pass <S%H5674>away<s%>.
Praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> from the <S%H776>earth<s%>, Ye <S%H8577>sea-monsters<s%>, and all <S%H8415>deeps<s%>.
Kings <S%H4428><s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> and all <S%H3816>peoples<s%>; <S%H8269>Princes<s%> and all <S%H8199>judges<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>;

Let them <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; For his <S%H8034>name<s%> alone is <S%H7682>exalted<s%>; His <S%H1935>glory<s%> is above the <S%H776>earth<s%> and the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>.

And he hath <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%>, The <S%H8416>praise<s%> of all his <S%H2623>saints<s%>; Even of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7138>near<s%> unto <S%H1984>him<s%>. Praise ye <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>.
